text.0: urged on the father of the earth and heaven hath gone forth like a car to gather booty.
text.1: going to indra sharpening his weapons and in his hand containing every treasure.
text.2: to him the tones of sacred song have sounded steer of the triple height the lifebestower.
text.3: dwelling in wood as varuṇa in rivers lavishing treasure he distributes blessings.
text.4: great conqueror warnorgirt lord of all heroes flow on thy way as he who winneth riches.
text.5: with sharpened arms with swift bow never vanquished in battle vanquishing in fight the foemen.
text.6: giving security lord of wide dominion send us both earth and heaven with all their fulness.
text.7: striving to win the dawns the light the waters and cattle call to us abundant vigour.
text.8: o soma gladden varuṇa and mitra cheer indu pavamana indra viṣṇu.
text.9: cheer thou the gods the company of maruts indu cheer mighty indra to rejoicing.
text.10: thus like a wise and potent king flow onward destroying with thy vigour all misfortunes.
text.11: for our wellspoken hymn give life o indu do ye preserve us evermore with blessings.
